articles.title: Is your child frightened of needles? Here's how to prepare them for their COVID vaccine - The Tribune
articles.description: Your child's experience of needles in their early years may impact how they feel about and react to subsequent vaccinations. So it's important to reduce the chance of a negative experience.
articles.content:
